title: WTT: Like To Trade Up Red Cobb for Red Cobb + $$

posts.post_title: WTT: Like To Trade Up Red Cobb for Red Cobb + $$
posts.post_content: Would like to trade for a nicer red Cobb (still probably a "2" or less). Trading the Cobb below and cash, or have a few other low grade T206 HOFers that I'd consider throwing in. Thanks!
